text: @JoeBiden The 123,000 deaths Joe.Yall need to quit lying. The number includes all who die ( no matter the cause ) and TEST POSITIVE , for #COVID19 . Joe , that means they could have been Asymptomatic . Oh and Joe , have you been tested and if so, what was the RESULT , Joe ? https://t.co/pKqnIXzjYH
